result.arabic_text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هَلۡ تُحِسُّ مِنۡهُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَوۡ تَسۡمَعُ لَهُمۡ رِكۡزَۢا
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Hari imigwi myinshi y’abantu Twahoneje aho hambere y’abagarariji mu bantu warungitsweko, hari n’umwe ubona muri bo yasigaye, canke ngo wumve n’ijwi ryabo[388]!
result.footnotes: [388] Iyi Aayah irihaniza abagarariji mu bantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), ko Imana Allah Ishobora kubahonya mu gihe borendegera mu bugarariji bwabo.
